DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational, study of dry eye in patients at the consultation visit prior to LASIK surgery. There is no treatment administered or intervention during the study.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Dry Eye Prior to Laser-Assisted in Situ Keratomileusis (LASIK) Therapy
DOC.criteria: Attending an ophthalmology consultation for LASIK
